*P (Z = 15) Atomic weight: /A_r / = 30.97380 g mol^-1 *   Nominal
density:   /ρ/ (g cm^-3 ) = 1.8200
    /σ//_a /(barns/atom) = [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 )  ×  5.14332E+01 
    /E/(eV) [/μ///ρ/](cm^2 g^-1 ) = /f/_2 (/e/ atom^-1 )  ×  1.35858E+06

    -1.8000E-02 /e/ atom^-1
